data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Gnezdilov, Vladimir M., Thierry, Bourgoin, Soulier-Perkins, Adeline (2014): Vietnamese Issidae (Hemiptera, Fulgoroidea): new taxa, new records and new distribution data. Zootaxa 3847 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3847.1.4
